00002 {
00003     using System;

00009 
00010     class CommandServer
00011     {
00012         public CommandServer(ushort _serverId)
00013         {
00014             serverId = _serverId;
00015 
00016             //       CommandName                CommandLevel                    CommandReference
00017             command["exit"] = new CommandName(0, new CommandDelegate(Exit));
00018             command["kick"] = new CommandName(0, new CommandDelegate(Kick));
00019         }
00020         
00021         private ushort serverId;
00022         private struct CommandName
00023         {
00024             public CommandName(byte _level, CommandDelegate _cmd)
00025             {
00026                 level = _level;
00027                 cmd = _cmd;
00028             }
00029             public byte level;
00030             public CommandDelegate cmd;
00031         }
00032         
00033         private delegate void CommandDelegate(Licence licence , string commandText);
00034         
00035         private Dictionary<string,CommandName> command = new Dictionary<string,CommandName> ();
00036 
00037         public ushort GetServerId()
00038         {
00039             return serverId;
00040         }
00041         public void Exec(Licence licence, string commandText)
00042         {
00043             string[] args = commandText.Split(' ');                 //Can Be little faster... since we need only left to first white space
00044             args[0] = args[0].Substring(1);                         //Remove "Prefix Command String".
00045 
00046             if (args.Length < 1 || !command.ContainsKey(args[0].ToLower()) || (command[args[0]].level > 0 && !licence.IsAdmin()))
00047             {
00048                 Session.serverList[serverId].server.log.debug("Command.Exec(), Bad Command Call From User: " + licence.GetConnectionPlayerName() + ", AccessLevel: " + (licence.IsAdmin()?"1":"0") + ", CommandSend: " + commandText + "\r\n");
00049                 return;
00050             }
00051             command[args[0]].cmd(licence, commandText);
00052         }
00053         #region Commands
00054         private void Exit(Licence licence, string commandText)
00055         {
00056             //Program.log.normal("Exiting Requested, Please Wait For All Thread Too Exit...\n\r");
00057             Program.Exit();
00058         }
00059         private void Kick(Licence licence, string commandText)
00060         {
00061             
00062             string[] args = commandText.Split(' ');
00063             if (args.Length != 2)
00064             {
00065                 //Session.server[serverId].Send_MTC_MessageToConnection("bad parameters Count, Usage: !kick username", licence.GetConnectionUniqueId(), 0);
00066                 return;
00067             }
00068             args[0] = args[0].Substring(1);                         //Remove "Prefix Command String".
00069 
00070             //Program.log.command("Command.Kick(), User: " + client.pName + ", Kicked User: " + args[1] + "\r\n");
00071 
00072             //Session.server[serverId].Send_MST_Message("/kick " + args[1]);
00073         }
00074         #endregion
00075     }
